title: S3 Ep133: The Fabulous Monday: Monday, August 3rd, 2020
itunes:title: The Fabulous Monday: Monday, August 3rd, 2020
description:
• Country singer Luke Combs marries fiancee Nicole Hocking in Florida (Page Six)
  • New Joan Rivers Comedy Albums Coming in 2021 (EXCLUSIVE) (Variety)
  • He's Here! Nikki Bella and Fiance Artem Chigvintsev Welcome Their First Child (PEOPLE)
  • Slimmed-down Adele is unrecognizable as she praises Beyonce's 'Black Is King' (Page Six)
  • Simone Biles Goes Instagram Official with New Boyfriend, NFL Player Jonathan Owens: 'Just Us' (PEOPLE)
